base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: All Fields - Agent Data Fields
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Agent Fields

{% for item in data_sources.agentAllFields %} {% endfor %}
id created_by created_time modified_by modified_time version operating_system plat goarch hostname agent_id last_seen public_ip total_ram boot_time logged_in_username last_logged_in_user monitoring_type description mesh_node_id overdue_email_alert overdue_text_alert overdue_dashboard_alert offline_time overdue_time check_interval needs_reboot choco_installed patches_last_installed time_zone maintenance_mode block_policy_inheritance alert_template_id site_id policy_id
{{ item.id }} {{ item.created_by }} {{ item.created_time }} {{ item.modified_by }} {{ item.modified_time }} {{ item.version }} {{ item.operating_system }} {{ item.plat }} {{ item.goarch }} {{ item.hostname }} {{ item.agent_id }} {{ item.last_seen }} {{ item.public_ip }} {{ item.total_ram }} {{ item.boot_time }} {{ item.logged_in_username }} {{ item.last_logged_in_user }} {{ item.monitoring_type }} {{ item.description }} {{ item.mesh_node_id }} {{ item.overdue_email_alert }} {{ item.overdue_text_alert }} {{ item.overdue_dashboard_alert }} {{ item.offline_time }} {{ item.overdue_time }} {{ item.check_interval }} {{ item.needs_reboot }} {{ item.choco_installed }} {{ item.patches_last_installed }} {{ item.time_zone }} {{ item.maintenance_mode }} {{ item.block_policy_inheritance }} {{ item.alert_template_id }} {{ item.site_id }} {{ item.policy_id }}

Agent Disks

{% for parent_item in data_sources.agentAllFields %} {% for item in parent_item.disks %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %}
Agent free used total device fstype percent
{{ parent_item.hostname }} {{ item.free }} {{ item.used }} {{ item.total }} {{ item.device }} {{ item.fstype }}
{{item.percent}}%

Agent Services

{% for parent_item in data_sources.agentAllFields %} {% if parent_item.services %}

{{parent_item.hostname}}

{% for item in parent_item.services %} {% endfor %}
pid name status binpath username autodelay start_type description display_name
{{ item.pid }} {{ item.name }} {{ item.status }} {{ item.binpath }} {{ item.username }} {{ item.autodelay }} {{ item.start_type }} {{ item.description }} {{ item.display_name }}
{% endif %} {% endfor %} {% endblock %}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentAllFields:
    defer:
    - services
    - wmi_detail
    model: agent
    limit: 1000
